DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study are to to evaluate the knowledge and understanding on tamoxifen theraphy for breast cancer patients and examine the decision conflict scale and satisfaction with decision scale while making decision to take tamoxifen.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study About Tamoxifen Therapy for Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The knowlege questionnaire about tamoxifen was developed by the medication guides that provide for patients taking tamoxifen and hormone therapy for breast cancer fact sheet from National Cancaer Institute. Several experts in the field of breast cancer and gynecologic cancer are going to review and indicate the questionnaire.
DOC.criteria: The breast cancer patients who take tamoxifen Exclusion criteria The patients who do not agree to participate in this study The paitents who have trouble with understanding and reading Korean.
